data_table.description: Subject ID, sample ID, sample source, source sample ID, and sample use variable obtained from participants with or without breast cancer and involved in the "African American Breast Cancer GWAS" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.comment: The same SUBJECT_ID may have two SAMPLE_ID (replicates)

variable.name: SAMPLE_ID
variable.comment: Unique sample identifier; replicates will have the same SUBJID

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
